select start_msg_idx, last_read_msg_idx, chat_room.chatroom_idx, chat_room.last_msg_idx, chat_room.chatroom_name, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now()) as timestamp from chatroom_member left join chat_room on chatroom_member.chatroom_idx = chat_room.chatroom_idx
where chat_room.chatroom_idx = #{chatroom_idx} and user_idx = #{user_idx};
select A.chatroom_idx, A.user_idx, B.name, B.profile_img, A.start_msg_idx, A.last_read_msg_idx from chatroom_member A join user B on A.user_idx = B.user_idx where A.chatroom_idx = #{chatroom_idx};
